entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with rain early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
